java/liquibase/change/DropNotNullConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SetNullableStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.Arrays;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00020 public class DropNotNullConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00021 
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String tableName;
00024     private String columnName;
00025     private String columnDataType;
00026 
00027 
00028     public DropNotNullConstraintChange() {
00029         super("dropNotNullConstraint", "Drop Not-Null Constraint");
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getSchemaName() {
00033         return schemaName;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00037         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getTableName() {
00041         return tableName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00045         this.tableName = tableName;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getColumnName() {
00049         return columnName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00053         this.columnName = columnName;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getColumnDataType() {
00057         return columnDataType;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00061         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00065         return new SqlStatement[]{new SetNullableStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName(), getColumnDataType(), true)};
00066     }
00067 
00068     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00069         AddNotNullConstraintChange inverse = new AddNotNullConstraintChange();
00070         inverse.setColumnName(getColumnName());
00071         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00072         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00073         inverse.setColumnDataType(getColumnDataType());
00074 
00075         return new Change[]{
00076                 inverse
00077         };
00078     }
00079 
00080     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00081         return "Null constraint dropped from " + getTableName() + "." + getColumnName();
00082     }
00083 
00084     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00085         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropNotNullConstraint");
00086         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00087             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00088         }
00089 
00090         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00091         element.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00092         return element;
00093     }
00094 
00095     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00096 
00097         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00098 
00099         Column column = new Column();
00100         column.setTable(table);
00101         column.setName(columnName);
00102 
00103 
00104         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00105     }
00106 }
